ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] My new Persona
ygData.msgSnippet: Ugh...  That has to suck.  Good luck!!  *hugs* ... From: PsyKo [mailto:sibilant_ghost@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, June 06, 2003 2:56 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Ugh... That has to suck. Good luck!! *hugs*



-----Original Message-----
From: PsyKo [mailto:sibilant_ghost@...]
Sent: Friday, June 06, 2003 2:56 PM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] My new Persona <on hold>




Well, Folks, it is gonna take some time for me to get
back on.... longer than I thought. It's amazing how
one day can screw up your life.....

It all started this morning. I woke up at 5am due
to my Mom's friends (yes I still live with my Mom)
next I hung around the mall to chew up some time until
my date tonight. So, After that I went to the leasing
office of the new apartment I am moving into... My
credit was sour, and I'll end up having to pay 1130$
by next friday for a deposit on the apartment. So, I
went to work to volenteer some extra time. I worked
for 2 hours and got canned for not making $300 in that
time... Yes, I got CANNED. I lost my job. So, then I
left there stopped at my date's place of work. And,
who do I see there? Her ex..... and, so, as she was
walking out I pulled her off to the side and come to
find out, the two of them had gotten back together 2
days ago right after I asked her out..... And, she
was gonna leave me high and dry at the restaurant....


and, THAT is why it is gonna take me longer to get on
EQ than I thought. =(

Later all, (depressed)PsyKo
